pr_title: SAK-44217 fix issue where Samigo GB item was being re-created every time assessment re-saved

timeline.message: SAK-44217 fix issue where Samigo GB item was being re-created every time the assessment was re-saved

timeline.author: ern

replies.bodyText: assessment.getCategoryId() can be null or a String so can't use NumberUtils.toLong on it
replies.author: ottenhoff

replies.bodyText: yeah it's on assessmentSettings.getCategorySelected() not assessment.getCategoryId() and assessment.getCategoryId() is a Long
replies.author: ern

replies.bodyText: Initializing selected with a default and then using equals should be all that is needed as selected.equals(assessment.getCategoryId()); will account for a null assessment.getCategoryId()
replies.author: ern

replies.bodyText: if -1 equals 0 or null then it would trigger the re-creation of the gb item ....
replies.author: ottenhoff
ern

replies.bodyText:
So lets simplify your if statement with:
return (oldCatId > 0 || newCatId > 0) && oldCatId.compareTo(newCatId) != 0;
replies.author: ern
